Class ComException

    • java.lang.Throwable

  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    ComFailException

    public abstract class ComException
extends JacobException
    Standard exception thrown by com jni code when there is a problem
